Zayd Bille

Hey there, my name's Zayd. I'm a Software Engineering student at Carleton University but that's not all. I have a passion for creative writing and I also love designing games. This is my page, where you'll find links to some of my stuff.

Utility Watch

A counter, coin flip feature and more come together in my Android application - the Utility Watch. Download it and try it out for yourself!

Minegrade

Minegrade is a gaming blog where I write about various things related to the gaming industry. You can check it out here.

Minecraft mods

Here you can find some mods I created for Minecraft using the Forge API.
